about_the_game:
This game is a companion to the new single 'Ain't No Surprise' by Ōtautahi, NZ Soul band, Adam Hattaway and the Haunters.

You are ELMORE, bandmate of ADAM HATTAWAY. ADAM is so hungover - last night he ate a spiders' nest thinking it was a pork bun, and is now infested with Lampona cylindrata. Luckily, you've been looking for a reason to try out your SHRINKING MACHINE, and after a flash of electricity, you find yourself a fraction of your normal size, looking up at a giant ADAM and knowing it's up to YOU to cure his hangover.

Your shrinking machine has a grappling hook which you can use to swing into Adam and launch yourself inside his body, where it's up to you to kill the spiders infesting him.

But first, something seems to be blocking Adam's nose...

Switch between 2 distinct gameplay styles: Physics-swinging around a giant photorealistic Adam Hattaway in a science-ball, and Magic School Bus-pilled 2d blasting when you enter Adam as a microscopic man with a jetpack and gun and have to clear out the spider menace from within.
detailed_description:
This game is a companion to the new single 'Ain't No Surprise' by Ōtautahi, NZ Soul band, Adam Hattaway and the Haunters.

You are ELMORE, bandmate of ADAM HATTAWAY. ADAM is so hungover - last night he ate a spiders' nest thinking it was a pork bun, and is now infested with Lampona cylindrata. Luckily, you've been looking for a reason to try out your SHRINKING MACHINE, and after a flash of electricity, you find yourself a fraction of your normal size, looking up at a giant ADAM and knowing it's up to YOU to cure his hangover.

Your shrinking machine has a grappling hook which you can use to swing into Adam and launch yourself inside his body, where it's up to you to kill the spiders infesting him.

But first, something seems to be blocking Adam's nose...

Switch between 2 distinct gameplay styles: Physics-swinging around a giant photorealistic Adam Hattaway in a science-ball, and Magic School Bus-pilled 2d blasting when you enter Adam as a microscopic man with a jetpack and gun and have to clear out the spider menace from within.

name: Ain't No Surprise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: As a temporarily microscopic person in a shrinking robot sphere, swing with your grappling hook up your lead singer's colossal body and invade different parts of his body to shoot the spiders infesting him, in this bold mix of 3d Physics Platformer and 2d Shoot'em'up.
